title: Augusta County: M. W. Pollard to Cousin James, May 6, 1863
summary: M. W. Pollard writes to her cousin James, telling him of her life at school, her studies, her teachers, and the people she has met. Also, she relates news of family members.
keywords: The date 1863 written in brackets in another hand on top of letter; letter consists of 4 physical pages, with "pages" 5-7 written crosswise on the first three.
